military_scenarios.name: Border Incursion

inputs.video: Unidentified vehicles crossing disputed border area
inputs.text: Reports of increased military activity in the region

military_scenarios.challenge: Assess threat level and determine appropriate response

military_scenarios.name: Hostage Rescue Operation

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of compound with suspected hostages

military_scenarios.challenge: Plan and execute a time-sensitive rescue operation

military_scenarios.name: Cyber Attack on Military Infrastructure

inputs.text: Cybersecurity system alerts detailing attack vectors

military_scenarios.challenge: Mitigate attack impact and identify perpetrators

military_scenarios.name: Humanitarian Aid Mission in Conflict Zone

inputs.video: Drone footage of destroyed infrastructure and displaced civilians
inputs.audio: Radio chatter indicating armed groups in the area
inputs.text: UN reports on urgent medical and food supply needs

military_scenarios.challenge: Coordinate aid delivery while ensuring personnel safety

military_scenarios.name: Submarine Detection in Territorial Waters

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of increased naval activity
inputs.text: Intercepted encrypted communications from the area

military_scenarios.challenge: Confirm threat and formulate diplomatic/military response
